name: AJR & Partners
overview:
AJR & Partners is an award winning full-service Public Relations and Marketing Agency located in Miami, Florida. AJR & Partners focuses on delivering Ideas > Communications > Results through a fully integrated marketing communications approach. AJR & Partners offers its clients the following marketing communications services:

Advertising Public Relations Social Media Web 2.0 PR Internet Marketing Market Research Marketing Consulting Services Website Design

Awards and Recognition:

Named Top-100 South Florida Small Business by South Florida Business Leader magazine 2008 MARCOM Platinum Award for Corporate PR and Branding Campaigns 2008 MARCOM Gold Award for Viral Marketing 2008 MARCOM Honorable Mention for Pro Bono Community Campaigns Recognized as South Florida Tech 100 firm (2004) Recognized as a Top 40 under 40 Leader by the South Florida Business Journal (2001) Creativity in Public Relations Award

AJR & Partners specializes in the following areas:

Technology Public Relations and Marketing B2B Public Relations and Marketing Healthcare Public Relations and Marketing Small and Medium Business PR Consumer Products Miami PR Agency Location: AJR & Partners | Public Relations Agency | Miami Florida
